books.title: Reign of the Supermen
books.author: Sam Liu
books.detail: After the death of Superman, several new people present themselves as possible successors.

books.title: Batman: The Killing Joke
books.author: Sam Liu
books.detail: As Batman hunts for the escaped Joker, the Clown Prince of Crime attacks the Gordon family to prove a diabolical point mirroring his own fall into madness.

books.title: Suicide Squad: Hell to Pay
books.author: Sam Liu
books.detail: ATask Force X targets a powerful mystical object that they will risk their lives to steal.

books.title: The Death of Superman
books.author: Jake Castorena, Sam Liu
books.detail: Superman battles against an insurmountable foe named Doomsday.

books.title: Teen Titans: The Judas Contract
books.author: Sam Liu
books.detail: Led by Starfire, the Teen Titans - Beast Boy, Raven, Blue Beetle, Robin and the just-returned Nightwing - have built a cohesive team in their never-ending battle against evil but their newest teammate, the mysterious, and powerful, Terra, may be altering that dynamic. Meanwhile, an ancient evil - Brother Blood - has awakened, and familiar foe Deathstroke is lurking in the shadows, both waiting to pounce. Ultimately, the Teen Titans will need to battle their enemies and their own internal doubts to come together and overcome the malicious forces around them in this twisting tale of intrigue, adventure and deception.

books.title: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Part 1
books.author: Jay Oliva
books.detail: Batman has not been seen for ten years. A new breed of criminal ravages Gotham City, forcing 55-year-old Bruce Wayne back into the cape and cowl. But, does he still have what it takes to fight crime in a new era?

books.title: Justice League Dark
books.author: Jay Oliva
books.detail: Beings with supernatural powers join together to fight against supernatural villains. This team of supernatural beings include John Constantine, Zatanna and Jason Blood also known as the demon Etrigan.

books.title: Batman: Gotham by Gaslight
books.author: Sam Liu
books.detail: In an alternative Victorian Age Gotham City, Batman begins his war on crime while he investigates a new series of murders by Jack the Ripper.

books.title: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Part 2
books.author: Jay Oliva
books.detail: The Batman has returned after a 10-year absence. The Gotham authorities want to arrest him. An old foe wants a reunion. The Feds want the Man of Tomorrow to put a stop to him.

books.title: Justice League: War
books.author: Jay Oliva
books.detail: The world's finest heroes found the Justice League in order to stop an alien invasion of Earth.

books.title: Justice League vs. Teen Titans
books.author: Jay Oliva
books.detail: Robin is sent to work with the Teen Titans after his volatile behavior botches up a Justice League mission. The Titans must then step up to face Trigon after he possesses the League and threatens to conquer the world.
